overview: A gay short film that shows how a relationship can go wrong if partners do not talk about their HIV status and if they do not know, what it even means. Patrick and Alex move in together when suddenly Patrick discovers the HIV diagnosis of his beloved partner. This short educational drama shows how important it is to talk openly about your HIV status. Furthermore, people diagnosed with HIV can have a normal life and do not present any danger to their partner. However, they have to know...
title: Positive
